import React, {Component} from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Link } from 'react-router-dom' export class ContactDetail extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } render() { return (

GET A CARD

    You can get your card through 1 in 2 ways later:
  • Go to the library directly, contact our librarian for card issuance instructions.
  • After signing up for the account, you will receive a confirmation email. then, you just need to give that email to the librarian and you will get card.

MANAGE MY ACCOUNT

Our library has more than 200,000 books and online resources to serve learning, teaching and researching requirements of students, lecturers.

PRINT

The library was established on May 11, 1995 and based on modern point of view, using new technology to create a convenient space for accessing information easily, as well as satisfy all information requests for all types of readers.

GET HELP

Position Full name
Librarian Nguyen Thi Cuc
Library Director Nguyen Van Hung
Library Technician Ho Van Anh
Assistant Librarian Tran Tien Hoang
) } }
